      • startDockerContainerMeasurement

        public void startDockerContainerMeasurement(java.lang.String containerID)
        Starts a threaded docker stats measurement of given container id.
        Parameters:
        containerID - the containerID of the container to be measured.

      • stopDockerContainerMeasurement

        public java.util.List<DockerStatsRecord> stopDockerContainerMeasurement()
        Ends the previously started docker stats measurement.
        Returns:
        A list of Pairs containing as Pair.first the cpu usage in % and as Pair.second the memory usage in %

      • estimateStorageSize

        public java.lang.Long estimateStorageSize(java.lang.String containerName,
                                          java.lang.String storageDirectoryPath,
                                          boolean external)
        Estimates the storage size of the given container.
        Parameters:
        containerName - the name of the docker container
        storageDirectoryPath - the path to the storage directory.
        external - true if storage size should be measured outside the docker container.
        Returns:
        the size of the storage directory mapped from container to host in bytes.
